textStyle.name: Bar label
textStyle.hint: Changes the number displayed on the bar.

config.hideHint: Don't display the bar when any of the checked conditions are met.
config.indentHint: Additional space on the side of the bar in percent of the token's width.
config.shareHeightHint: Prevents the bar from reserving any vertical space, which moves the following bar to the same line.
config.ignoreLimitsHint: Disables clamping of input values between 0 (lower) and the maximum (upper). This is only applied to custom bars as clamping for other attributes is handled by the system.
config.invertHint: Displays 0 as a full bar and the maximum value as an empty bar.
config.label: Label prefix
config.labelHint: Displays the configured text on the bar.
config.approximateHint: Shows an approximate value on the bar and its label. This configures the number of segments to display.
config.approximateOwnerHint: Indicates whether the approximated value is also displayed for the owner of the token.
config.fgImageHint: Replaces the usual bar with an image that is clipped based on the fill percentage.
config.bgImageHint: Replaces the usual bar background with an image. It is recommended that both images have the same width as the scene's grid size.

storePerType.name: Defaults per type
storePerType.hint: Stores the default token resources separately for each actor type.
